title: PhD Scholarships: Vice Chancellor Scholarships and TWI Scholarships (minimum 5 in total)
text:
Engineering enterprise Design, manufacturing and innovative products 
We are looking for candidates to apply with a background in any area of engineering, design or technology-related disciplines. Candidates should have, or expect to achieve, a strong undergraduate degree (2:1 or above). Candidates with relevant Masters degrees or those with practical experience in research or industry are also encouraged to apply. 
A tax-free bursary is available for 3 years. Tuition fees will be waived up to a maximum amount equivalent to the universityâ€™s home/EU tuition fee for a full-time MPhil/PhD student. International scholars must pay the difference between the international and home/EU tuition fees. 
Informal enquiries for the VC Scholarships should be directed to Professor Peter Kyberd (Engineering Science) email: p.j.kyberd@gre.ac.uk or Dr Alec Coutroubis (Applied Engineering and Management) email: a.d.coutroubis@gre.ac.uk and for the TWI Scholarships to Professor Huapeng Chen email: h.chen@gre.ac.uk . 
Applications must be made online via http://www2.gre.ac.uk/jobs . No other form of application will be considered . The closing date for applications is Friday 16 th October 2015. Selection interviews will take place shortly after the closing date. Share this PhD
